title: Episode 81: Rick’s Picks NYC
description: This week on Let’s Eat In, Cathy is joined by Rick Field, founder of the popular artisanal pickle company Rick’s Picks NYC. Learn more about the art of food preservation and find out how Rick traded his career in television to pursue his passion for pickling. Find out why squash don’t make for good pickles and hear what Rick’s ideal date meal would be. This episode was sponsored by Hearst Ranch.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
